instructions:
Mix salt and pepper with flour and sprinkle 1 tbsp over meat. Place meat in a shallow 2 quart baking dish.
Mix 1 cup water, broth, soup mix, garlic, Worcestershire sauce and thyme and pour over meat. Cover with
foil and place in a 325 F oven for 1 3/4 hours. Turn meat, add potatoes, carrots and onions, cover and return
to oven for 30 to 45 minutes or until meat and vegetables are tender.
Remove juices from baking dish to a saucepan while keeping meat and vegetables warm. Add remaining
flour to remaining water and add sufficient mixture to thicken gravy when heated to boiling for 1 minute.
Serves 2 with left over meat.
name: Beef Shank Roast
creator: Taste of Home
